data.text:
One day, I was looking for Air Shakur. I was surprised to find her 
fast asleep, with her laptop still on.
As I went to close her laptop, something onscreen caught my eye. She was on the front page of a social media site, logged in as "!monad"――

It looked like an account dedicated to posting digital music. A bit 
taken aback by her unexpected hobby, I quietly took my leave.
A few days later, the two of us went to check out a record store.

I'd invited her, thinking I had nothing to lose, and it turned out 
that she was planning to buy something anyway. She let me 
come along― "As long as you don't do anything else".

Y'know, you sure shrug things off easy. It's like you forgot what 
happened with the net cafe...
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: Don't you try and start a conversation while we're in there.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
...Whole lotta problems when it comes to small-time artists, huh. 
If they were with a label I could just click buy and be done with it.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
It seemed she was planning to buy a CD from a fairly unknown 
artist.

...Not really.
's just good for clearing my head.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: ――Take a listen, everyone. Here's my new song―― "rust".
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text:
Shakur stopped suddenly to watch the young musician spinning 
music on her turntable.
...She's the one whose CD I came to buy.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: Never thought I'd see her now of all times.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
With that, Shakur slunk a bit further away from the DJ, taking in 
the music.

With the melody set to an energetic rhythm, punctuated with 
light vocal samples, it was the kind of pleasant music you 
couldn't help but move along with.
...Not bad, I guess.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
From the sample she posted, I thought it'd be more high-pitched 
old-school stuff... Looks like she shifted gears to more of a 
bounce vibe.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
Well, styles change. 
C'mon, let's go.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: E-excuse me! Please, take a look!
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text: Hmm?
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: The artist handed a flyer to Shakur.

I'm still new and all, but I'm going to be DJing at this event. 
Please come and enjoy, if you're interested!
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text: ...Thanks. Oh, it's this weekend ―― ...!
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: I took a look at the flyer. The DJ's introductory blurb described her as "Inspired by the faceless DJ !monad " ―
Uh... Sorry, is there something wrong?
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text: Nah, you're good. Good luck this weekend.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: So there's a DJ you admire, eh?
So there's a DJ you admire, eh?

data.text: ! Hey!
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: Yeah, totally! I really look up to !monad ! It's pretty easy to tell our styles are similar, so I try to keep super conscious about it.
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text:
Those voice samples were my way of differentiating myself, 
y'know? I'm still working on it, though!
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text: ...!monad is just an hobbyist keeping their hands busy. They don't even have the fundamentals down.
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: Whoa, whoa, don't say stuff like that. !monad is like, my hero!
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text: ...Your hero?
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
Well, not like they swooped in and saved me. 
Never even seen their face. It's more like...
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text:
I didn't really fit in. And my life wasn't great. 
I was stuck in a rut, and didn't think things could really change.
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text: But hearing !monad give the world the finger with their music really inspired me! Got me thinking maybe I could do it, too!
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text: Wait, no! Forget all that stuff about me, they're on a whole other level! The call of their soul, the evanescence, there's nothing like it!
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text:
I hope I can meet the real thing someday.
I bet they're, like, passionate to the bone!
data.name: Young Music Artist

data.text:
...Ah?
What's with that shit-eating grin...!
data.name: Air Shakur

data.text: A few days later...
Hey, check this out. This flyer stuck out a lot on bulletin board. Wonder if some student put it up.
data.name: Umamusume A

data.text:
Yeah, maybe. What's it for, anyway? Some kind of dance club? 
...Ooh, might go check it out.
data.name: Umamusume B

data.text:
It seemed like the peculiar-looking flyer caused quite a bit of 
buzz among the students.
